Package ca.utoronto.csc301.SelfCheckOut.Exceptions

Exception Summary
AddWhileBaggingException A simple exception which is thrown when a customer tries to scan a new item before bagging the previous one.
AddWhilePayingException A simple exception which is thrown when a customer tries to scan a new item once they have begun to pay for their purchases.
IncorrectStateException The IncorrectStateException is not normally used directly, but acts as a parent class for those exceptions which represent violations of the business rules of the states a SelfCheckOut object can be in.
InvalidBICException An exception which is thrown when a BIC fails to construct because the bulk item code provided is null or illegal.
InvalidProductException An exception which is thrown when a scanned product does not exist in the product database.
InvalidUPCException An exception which is thrown when a UPC fails to construct because the universal product code provided is null or illegal.
